text:
Pours almost a pitch black if it weren¬ít for the red , small pinkish head of foam. Minimal lacing. 
Smells of tart raspberries, mild funk, wood, has some acetic aromas. 
Smacked in my face with the tart raspberries, a bit of funk and wood, much sourness in an acetic kind of way. This is like I asked Crooked Stave to brew a beer with exactly the proper mix of ingredients that I wanted them to and they did it. Beer of 2017 for me? Perhaps.

Une bi√®re brune fonc√©e, plut√¥t opaque avec des reflets rubis, sans grande carbonatation. Au nez, les framboises se manifestent bien avec avec un c√¥t√© r√©glisse noire √©galement. Les levures sauvages sont √©galement bien pr√©sentes, rappelant en quelque sorte une oud bruin. En bouche, les framboises dominent franchement, avec une bonne effervescence ainsi qu¬íun go√ªt chocolat√© un peu surprenant. Il y a √©galement un c√¥t√© fort alcoolis√© provenant du vieillissement en barriques. Difficile √† boire, bi√®re compliqu√©e, complexe. La bi√®re a une finale bois√©e et un peu am√®re, terminant le tout d¬íune fa√ßon encore plus complexe.

Draft. An amber beer with an off-white head. The aroma has notes of fruits, brett, wood, and raspberries. The flavor is sour with notes of fruits, cherries, wood, malt, and brett, leading to a tart finish.

Flaska fr√•n Beergium, tappad dec 2015. H√§ller upp en m√∂rk brunr√∂d, n√§stan lite lila, v√§tska. I glaset m√∂rkt m√∂rkbrunr√∂d, n√§stan svart med tjusigt brunr√∂drosa liten skumkrona. Stor, maffig doft av hallon, kolaremmar, fylliga k√∂rsb√§rstoner med syrliga k√∂rsb√§rsk√§rnor, ek, hallonlakritsgodis som m√∂ts av choklad, marsipan och mandelmassa. Stor och fyllig kropp som samtidigt √§r stram och riktigt torr. Riktigt fin fatkarakt√§r! I smaken en djup, frisk och bitande syrlighet med massor av f√§rska hallon tillsammans med k√∂rsb√§rsk√§rnor, halm, kolaremmar, kola, lite fudge, massor av fatkarakt√§r och en rej√§l sl√§ng av r√∂dvinsvin√§ger. Grymt djup och komplexitet och ett magiskt samspel! St√§mmer p√• s√• oerh√∂rt m√•nga punkter. Helt klart en av de b√§sta surisarna jag druckit. Perfektion!

Very dark brown pour with red tints. Aroma of raspberry, blueberry, wood, dates and dried fruits with a hint of dark chocolate. Flavor follows, with lots of blueberry and raspberry, exceedingly tart. Delicious.

Tasted on 5/7/17 from a capped 375mL bottle. Pours dark brown, nearly black, with an average brown, pink tinted head, that slowly recedes to an average collar of lace. The nose is a really interesting combination of dark roast and coffee, vanilla and cinnamon whiskey, and tart raspberry candy, with an added tart funk that contains both lemon and a hint of vinegar. The flavor is primarily sour, with all of the citrus, hint of vinegar, and tart raspberry up front, moving to some of the milk chocolate, vanilla, and cinnamon whiskey, along with the somewhat bitter roasted coffee on the back of the palate. The body is full with a really cool tannic and acidic structure, lively carbonation, and a very long quite sour lemon, raspberry, hint of whiskey and coffee bitterness finish.

On tap @ Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016. This one has a mild cloudy yellow golden colored body and a small islandy shattered off-white head on the top. Nice mild aroma - initially anyhow. Some grains, lemonade. Sweetish almost. Some peach. Nice mild. Much more sour and fresh in the taste. Wow! Lime peel and grapefruit vinegar. Oaky. Feels thin oily in the mouth and it¬ís just below average on the prickling carbonation. Nice, fres and definitely palate cleansing. 13.05.2016

375ml bottle. Opaque, darkest brown colour with small, creamy, fairly lasting, minimalyl lacing, beige to tan head. Fantastic, full-blown, sweet-ish, tart, fruity, earthy raspberry aroma, a touch of raspberry vinegar, funk and vanilla. Taste is sour, dry, fruit acidic notes of raspberry, musty leathery interference.

Bottle, courtesy of SinH4. Pours reddish dark brown with a pinkish beige foam. Aroma is incredibly strong raspberry, veeeery little porter aroma. Chocolate, I guess. Body is sour, medium, but intense raspberry again, tart, super fizzy, like one of those sour candies. Sour long palate. Very nice. And highly unusual.
Bottle. Dark brown color with beige head. Aroma is pure raspberries, blackest chocolate, fresh yeast. Taste is raspberries, sour, a bit chalky, very sour finish.

Refrigerated 75 cl brown bottle poured into a Teku. Opaque crimson with small pink head. Aroma is dry raspberry, medium/light body, lower carbonation, and little lacing. Taste is somewhat rich tart raspberry, oak, and some brett.

Dark brown color with red hues and pinkish head. Aroma has dark cherries, raspberries, dried plums, a hint of dried figs. Taste starts sour and quite acidic, really fruity, lots of raspberries and cherries, just a hint of whiskey but the wood barrel is present. Medium body, quite smooth but also slightly acidic. Excellent, complex aroma, taste is slightly metallic but still really good.

Bottle with the Taps 1MK tasting crew, Kuala Lumpur. Poured a hazy medium brown with a thin whispy off white head. The aroma is big red berry fruit, moderate brett. The flavour is moderate to strong sour with a crisp light, tart raspberry, light dough palate. Medium bodied with soft carbonation. Super sour and super fruity!

Dark opaque purpley brown. Light pink tan head. Sour raspberry jammy nose, quite sweet. Some stronger notes of coffee emerge as it warms up. Really sour, fairly sweet. Big body, very acidic. Long finish. Slightly oily. Incredible.

375 shared by Marcus. Pours dark berry color with an odd reddish color head. Aroma is ripe raspberry. Medium body. Flavor is dark berry and moderate sour. Mild supporting whiskey and wood. The Brett flavor is apparently well masked. Good and very drinkable.

Bottle from my friend Rick. Pours purplish brown with a transient purple head and a fragrant raspberry aroma. There is a magnificent hearty black raspberry flavor that is quite tart and a hint of whiskey. This is a lovely sour.

Sample at The Source. This brew is a dark ruby-brown color with a medium pinkish-white head that evaporates steadily to a film. Strings of lacing on the glass. Aroma of raspberry, oak, yeast and malt. Medium to full body with a tart raspberry character and notes of oaky whiskey, funky yeast, and biscuit malt. The finish is moderately tart with a raspberry and oak aftertaste. Good beer all around.

UPDATED: FEB 23, 2017 Rami Rami is drinking a Nightmare On Brett Aged In Leopold Bros Whiskey Barrels With Raspberry by Crooked Stave Artisan Beer Project at Saska KƒôpaAromat zdominowany malinami, smak mniej, pojawia sie to bazowe piwo, slodkawo rodzynkowe nutki. Ale aromat zagluszony. Faktucznie cierpkieOcena potraktowana skryptem do przeliczania ocen (uzgodnienie UT/RB).

Tap @ basement beer bar Aalborg. Aroma of fruity brett, bretted raspberries. Dark brown with off-white head, mostly diminishing. Taste is moderate fruit sour, dry and light bitter. Medium body, dry feel and sour brett finish.
Dark with violet. Strong wild raspberry with other red fruit playing second fiddle. Slight whiskyish flavour. Really great!

Bottle from a friend. Brown color, beige head. Sour taste with raspberry, cherry, tart, acidic notes, a bit of wood and sour apples. Sour finish with raspberry, cherry, acidic notes, wood and tart. Exquisite sour ale.

Stunningly delicious Dark red colour with a tiny amount of head. Big raspberry and malt and slightly whiskey aroma. Very smooth above average mouthfeel. Gorgeous raspberry flavour, with more sophistication as it warms. Excellent.
A: Deep dark brown colour with a thin light brown head. N: Raspberry! T: Raspberry bomb! Hint of chocolate and vanilla. O: Very tart and LOADS of raspberry!

Bottle. Pours a dark amber brown color with a small off-white head. Has a fruity sour woody raspberry aroma. Fruity sour tart raspberry flavor with weak woody hints. Has a fruity sour tart woody raspberry finish.

Bottle. Pours deep black, medium tan head, decent lacing. Aroma is huge raspberry, hints of oak, whiskey, funk. Flavor is fairly tart, huge raspberry, light plus funk, whiskey. Medium body. Potent. Interesting.
Bottle at Cotteridge Wines tasting room; dark purple/brown pour with a dark pink head, aroma has dark raspberries, taste has tart raspberry, some wood, hint of spirit, hint of nut.

Bottle shared by Brian. Pours dark reddish brown with a small reddish head. Aromas of vinegar, raspberries, tannins, vanilla, lactic, chocolate, dark fruits, light ash, roast. Taste is vinegary, balsamico, lactic, raspberries, oak, vanilla, fudge, chocolate, dark fruits, tannins. Nice!

Draught @ CBC 2016 [ Blue Session ]. - Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016, Oksnehallen Vesterbro, Halmtorvet 11, 1700 Copenhagen, Denmark. [ As Crooked Stave Nightmare on Brett (Raspberry) ].Clear dark black brown color with a small, fizzy, fair lacing, mostly diminishing, off-white head. Aroma is moderate malty, roasted, barnyard, wood, moderate to heavy raspberry, tart raspberry. Flavor is moderate sweet and acidic with a long duration, tart, raspberry, dark malt, sweet malt, barnyard, wood - brett. Body is medium, texture is oily to watery, carbonation is soft. [20160513]

Ein unfassbar intensives Geschmacksinferno. Extreme Aromen von Beeren, Fass, Kr√§uter und S√§ure feuern alle Sinne an. Der Trunk dann RASPBERRY POWER...HOT AS HELL!!! Aber damit nicht genug, der Nachtrunk ist exorbitant sour, long und definitv einzigartig. Ein Biermasterpiece f√ºr alle Extremisten. 25cl/70DKK in MIKKELLERs KOELSCHIP Kopenhagen.
From tap at CBC 2016. Dark ruby colour with a pink head. Aroma and flavour of raspberries, oak, acidic, sourness, whisky and fruit.
Bottle. Pours a dark cola color with a pinkish off-white head. Big raspberry aroma. Tastes of raspberries, moderately sour, acidic. Very nice.
Bottle at Hazel, shared with Travlr. Thanks! Poured a dark ruby red color with a small pink hue. Aroma was lots of tart raspberries, red wine barrel notes. Rich, smooth and tart. Nice.

Fat p√• CBC-2016. Wow! Smak och doft av hallon, bl√•a b√§r, k√∂rsb√§r, jord och j√§st. 
Stor kropp, frisk och syrlig, fyllig, fin s√∂tma, rena fina smaker i fantastisk bra balans, doftar ljuvligt. Fantastisk!

From tap at Koelschip, Copenhagen. Complex aroma of intense raspberries, sour red fruits, tart berries, wood, bretty funk, with a malt and soft chocolate backbone. Nicely big sour flavour with some sweetness as well. Body is medium to full, very rich and deep. Remarkable raspberry Sour!
Tap Dark reddish colour with pinkish head.Aroma of tart Raspberrys and red wine good sourish taste with hint of vinagar and acid lively with good carbonation and good long taste.
Bottle at Hazel with Radagast99. Deep clear burgundy color. Aroma of raspberry, red wine. Taste is aiftly sour raspberry and port, tannins, cherry. Delicious.

My Bottom Line:
Leather-bound raspberries envelop the palate with juiciness and sourness in this superbly flavorful creation.

Further Personal Perceptions:
-A slim ring of foam circles the darkened blood red.
-Mouthfeel is silky and juicy, though the intensity of the sourness decreases drinkability somewhat. Eat some creamy goat cheese with it and it all becomes heavenly.
-A touch of chocolate is imagined as well.
-The nose points to a sweeter beer (oaken vanilla notes), but the flavour profile and texture have nothing sweet to showcase. This is all about fruit, acidity¬Ö and luxury.
-Body is very dry as well.
-Whisky blends in perfectly.
-Carbonation is practically absent, which takes this beer even closer to the world of wine.

Bottle.

375 ml bottle shared with Tmoney99. Pours a dark purple/reddish/brown color with a small pinkish colored head. The aroma and flavor have tart raspberries, mild Brett, whiskey, wood, caramel sweetness, some acidity, touch of vinegar, very nice drinking beer.

Bottle shared by alexsdad06. Poured a clear reddish brown color that mostly lasted with very good lacing. Moderate to heavy sour yeast, wood and tart berry aroma. Medium to full body with a tingly texture and soft carbonation. Medium to heavy sour & tart fruit flavor with a medium to heavy tart & sour finish of moderate to long duration. This is a standout beer.

dark reddish-brown colour, medium sized creamy pinkish-beige head; aroma of raspberry, vinegar notes, tart and earthy-wine cellar-like notes; taste is dominated by intensive vinegar-ish sourness with citric acid notes, raspberry, white wine-like notes, tart and leather; great "beer"
appear dark brown without head. aroma of rasberry, vanilla, very roasted malt, light rhubarb, taste Very sour!. full bodied, lively carbonation, long sour finish.

from bottle, poured a deep red clouded colour with a deep pink head. nose is loaded with sweer fresh raspberries upfront. sour blueberries, cacao, oak, tart funk, i think the whisky adds a little bit of sweetness to it. almost going to an acid finish, nice tart. nice stuff
Sample @ Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016. Hazy red body with a small offwhite head. Barnyard, raspberries, funk, fruitmarmelade, jammy.
From tap. Pours hazy dark amber with a small pink head. Aroma is raspberry and mild citric. Sulphorish, dry, citric and tart. Lingering raspberry instense and sulphorish finish.

Pours dark brown with a red hue and medium khaki with pink highlights that fades leaving behind good lacing, spotty cap and medium ring. AROMA: loads of raspberry, barrel notes, vanilla, woody, tart cherry, acidic, dark stone fruit, pomegranate, phenols, earthy, boozy, herbal, floral, yeast esters, sweet, light citrus, tart, rubber and slight char. TASTE: loads of raspberry, woody, tart cherry, acidic, pomegranate, earthy, boozy, herbal, floral, very mellow funk, sweet, light citrus, tart, mellow chocolate, bready and dark stone fruit. AFTER TASTE: tart raspberry/cherry, Brett, citrus and bourbon notes with a sweet acidic crisp finish.

375ml bottle. Pours dark red in colour with a pinky beige foam head. Nose of sweet raspberry, candy, citric rind, vanilla, funk. Flavour is sour, raspberry, dark fruits, whisky barrel woody oak, funky, tangy. Slick mouthfeel, medium bodied, fine carbonation, dry sweet & sour finish. Nicely drinkable.

Draught @ CBC 2016, Blue session, K√∏benhavn
Pours dark reddish brown with a reddish beige head. Aroma has notes of raspberry, caramel, brett, berry and funk. Taste is medium sweet and medium sour with a long berry, brett and funky finish. Body is medium, texture is oily, carbonation is soft.

Bottled. Pours deep redish brown with a small beige head. Aroma of wood,vanilla, caramel, sour raspberries, bourbon notes and brett. Slightly sweet flavor that ends up dy and tart. Medium bodied, oily texture and soft carbonation. An excellent Sour. üåüüåüüåüüåü

CBC. Hazy brown/red with small beige head. Aroma is malt, sour fruit, roasted malt, raspberries, oak and wood. Flavour is malt, yeast, raspberries, sour fruit, oak, wood, berries, medium sweet, sour and acid.
Bottle at home. Pours black, nose is funky, chocolate, raspberry, oak, toffee, taste is tart raspberry, dry, toffee, hints of the whisky.

Draught @ CBC. Pours hazy dark reddish brown with a small red/brown head. Aroma of sourness, wood, yeast, brett, rich raspberry. Falvor is rather sour, yeasty, brett, wood, tart fruity, rich raspberry. Medium body, average carbonation, acidic finish. 130516

From tap at Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016 - Blue session. Dark red copper color with pinkish off white head. Yeasty and malty aroma, funky, fruity, raspberries, wood, caramel, light alcohol. Sweet and acidic taste like aroma. Medium oily body with soft carbonation.

Un liquide √† la robe pourpre, presque aubergine, entre un vin rouge, un porto et un jus de pruneaux. La mousse lors du service est d¬íune couleur profonde, signe que le liquide est dense et bien sirupeux. Un nez o√π un puissante framboise se r√©v√®le fi√®rement en l¬íemportant sur la barrique qui fait pi√®tre figure devant le fruit acidul√©. Des p√©pins de framboises en quantit√© sur une base chocolat√©e. Un funk int√©ressant dont les nuances sont att√©nu√©es par le fruit et l¬íalcool. Tr√®s s√ªrette en bouche, mes joues salivent abondamment. L¬íalcool me r√©chauffe et me picotte la langue. Des ar√¥mes funky et bois√©es, se terminant sur une finale am√®re. Belle bi√®re s√ªrette dont je ne m¬íexplique toutefois pas la pr√©sence dans le top-50.
CBC. Hazy red brown with a beige head. Aroma is sweet, malty, heavy raspberries and bretty. Flavor is quite sweet and moderate acidic. Dry and moderate acidic finish. 130516

Fat p√• CBC-16 Kanske bl√• passets b√§sta i v√§ldigt h√•rd konkurrens. Vackert mahognyr√∂d. Djup m√∂rk doft med massor av s√∂ta hallon och boysenb√§r. Stor kropp, s√∂t hallonlik√∂r och spetsad choklad men ocks√• frisk och syrlig med hallon och lite k√∂rsb√§r. Till det fin fat karakt√§r fr√•n whiskyen. Komplex otroligt v√§lbalanserad och med en doft som nog √§r det b√§sta jag provat.
[5/13/16] Draught sample at Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016. Blue session. Reddish dark brown. Wonderful raspberry aroma, with some funk and wood. Sour raspberries flavor. Delicious, great.
Tap CBC. Aroma of fruits, berries, dark fruits, funky, sour, light vomit, quite barny with a smooth touch of something sweet.

Sour fruity aroma and taste, great raspberry hits, medium acidic, grapes, berry fruit medley, whisky soaked wooden notes, tart fruity finish. Excellent.
Sample @ CBC¬í16, Copenhagen. Blue session. Reddish pour with a pale head. Notes of tannins, juicy berries, cranberries and raspberries, wood, light balsamico and some funk.
Tap @ Copenhagen Beer Celebration, 2016. Pours Pinkish with a white head. Intense juicy berries. Tart and funky with a touch of Wood. Lovely dry finish.

Sample at CBC Blue Session. Pours dark ruby with reddish head. Tart raspberry aroma with chocolate, light cherries, maybe a hint towards sugared rhubarb. Moderately sour taste with loads of raspberries and some chocolate together with redcurrant and oak. Raspberry and chocolate, what¬ís not to love?
On tap at CBC 2016. Dark ruby pour with a red head. Raspberries, fruit sourness, some nice barrel (oak and vanilla) notes in the background. Nice one.
Sample at CBC 2016. Tart and fruity smell with raspberries and some funk. Similar taste, tart with a fruity tartness to it. Nice!

Sample at CBC 2016. 

Reddish/brown with a small head. Fresh and tart aroma of raspberries, oak, caramel and dark chocolate. Similar taste. Really refreshing and nicely drinkable. Very tasty.

CBC2016. Tr√ºbes tr√ºbes dunkel r√∂tlich braunes Bier mit einer leicht pinken Schaumkrone. Geruch nach roten Fr√ºchten, holzig, Himbeeren, Kirschen. Geschmack s√§uerlich fruchtig, Himbeeren, Kirschen, lecker.

Blue session, Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016.
Deep brown beer with a nice pinkish/beige head. Sourish raspberry aroma, chocolate, caramel, wildstrawberries, a bit tart. Sourish raspberry flavor, citrus, wild strawberries, floral, some strawberries. Quite nice

@Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016, BLUEintense dark raspberries on nose. Farmy, some old hay. Med bodied, intense, exploading flavour. Raspberries, raspberry seedy malty hay. Really intense nice sour.-- rated with beerbasher/winphone

Tap @ CBC -16. Dark burgundy color with a small top. Rich raspberry aroma with some acidic notes. Taste is moderate sour with loads of raspberry flavor. Some burnt sugar and liqourice as well. Medium body and soft co2

13.05.2016, tap @ CBC:
Small slightly bubbly shortlasting head, nice deep reddish color. Aroma is concentrated sour-ish fruity, raspberry syrup, soda powder, sorrel, oak, sour raspberries, berry skin, mild vinegar, grass. Taste is sour-ish dry, sorrel, sour raspberries, oak, soda powder, raspberry syrup, red currants, grass, vinegar, berry skin. Medium bitterness, sour-ish dry mouthfeel. Very nice.
UPDATED: MAY 19, 2016 Keg at cbc16... Dark red brown.. Thin tan lacing.. Soft raspberry fruit nose... Soft Tart raspberry... Long dry fruit.. Bitter fruit.. Big raspberry

Draught @ CBC 2016, Copenhagen. Pours deep dark red with a smooth head. Aroma of juicy raspberries, tart and sourish notes, oak and wood. Taste is heavily sour, tartish and funky yeasty with some wood, oak and raspberries. Finish is aggressively sour, tart and woody with loads of raspberries. Heavy but tasty.
Tap at CBC2016, Copenhagen. Colour is reddish brown with small white head. Aromas and flavors: Berries, raspberries, tartness and some sourness. Pretty nice.

Pours deep burgundy brown with low reddish head. Aroma of raspberries, chocolate, black berries, black currant. Taste is rich berry tart with a mellow fruit sweet finish. Light and crisp body with average carbonation.

Pours bloody brown with low purple head 
Aromas of tart raspberries, raspberry jam, oak, caramel, brown sugar, red fruits 
Taste has notes of tart raspberries, green grapes, green apples, citrusy fruits
CBC 2016. Pours a very dark red with a low reddish head. Aromas of raspberry, funk, citrus, red currant. Taste is very sour and fruity. Mouthfeel is very dry and tart with medium carbonation.
Bottle - pours raspberry purple pink head - nose/taste of raspberry, chocolate, sour oak, cocoa and whiskey - med body
Bottle. Ruby brown pour with tan head. Roasted, chocolate, full raspberries and tart aromas. Sweet and tart raspberries, dark sour Flavors.

Bottle from wchesser -- cheers! Dark sour complexity that¬ís taken even further into strange territory by the raspberries. It¬ís got a good amount of funk and acidic bite, and the berry fruitiness is definitely apparent. It tastes a bit like Nyquil, but very interesting, funky, probably organic Nyquil. If organic, funky Nyquil isn¬ít a thing yet and you think it sounds good -- go buy some of this beer!
375 ml bottle. Dark pour. Chocolate and raspberry throughout. Some really nice deep notes. Slight whisky, Ends with vinegar tart.

Dark blackish purple with reddish violet head... Aroma of raspberry jam, roasted malts, dark fruits, acetic notes... Flavor is roasted malts, sour raspberries, leather... Raspberry notes overpower whiskey barrel aging, still present but much more subdued... Original a bit better, but still delicious

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Black hue with a foamy, light pink head. Big funky earthy raspberry and slight roast on the slightly boozy nose. Big robust and funky flavor with a load of Brett and a load of boozy deep roast malt, a lively juicy raspberry tone and a slight acidic finish. Big stouty and raspberry flavors with a big sourness as well.

Draft at the source, pours dark purple almost black with light purple hued head. Aroma and flavor of dank raspberry jam, wet oak, other sour fruit and a touch of whiskey oak. This one had a lot of pucker but in a good way. Nice stuff

Appearance: pours with a small pink head that settles quickly, the beer is a very dark ruby color, almost black
Aroma: raspberry, egg, some warmth and some other aroma I can't put my finger on from the whisky is apparent, funk
Taste: very sour throughout, has a strong tartness as well, raspberry sweetness followed by the slightest hint of alcohol, wood
Palate: soft carbonation, leaves mouth dry, minimal tart aftertaste, medium to heavy mouthfeel 
Overall: this is quite interesting in both the aroma and the taste, but mostly the aroma, very sour, hides abv well

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Tap. Clear dark ruby reddish brown with a small raspberry head that lasts and a ring and laces some. Aromas raspberries, roasted malt, light chocolate. Flavor is big on the raspberries, roasted malt, chocolate, light caramel, and funk. Medium bodied, smooth yet acidic with a dry end.
Bottle courtesy of Will. Ruby red near purple color with minimal head. Aroma is huge jammy raspberries, grapes, vanilla, oak. Taste is very tart and very jammy with mild funk. great beer.

On tap at Crooked Stave poured a clear dark reddish brown with a small lingering pinkish head. Aromas of raspberry, roasted malt, light funk and lught cocoa. Palate was light bodied and crisp with a dry tart finish. Flavors of raspberry, roasted malt, light funk and light cocoa with a crisp dry tart lingering roasty raspberry finish.

375 ml bottle shared, purchased at the brewery for $14. Almost black in appearance with ruby hues and a light brown head. Big, pronounced raspberry aroma with dark sour fruitiness and light oak barrel. Similar flavor, fruity, juicy, mildly sour and lightly woody with a mild sweet finish. Medium to full body with a light puckering feel. Nice.

Draft at release. Dark reddish brown. Nose is raspberry seeds and jam over the standard NoB base of dark cherry and other sour fruits, light barrel, leather. Raspberry is prominent. Taste is tart dark fruits, raspberry jam (but dry), raspberry seeds, and some burnt malts.
